Package com.seailz.discordjv.events.model.interaction.select.entity

Class UserSelectMenuInteractionEvent

java.lang.Object
com.seailz.discordjv.events.model.Event
com.seailz.discordjv.events.model.interaction.InteractionEvent
com.seailz.discordjv.events.model.interaction.select.entity.UserSelectMenuInteractionEvent
public class UserSelectMenuInteractionEvent extends InteractionEvent
Fires when a UserSelectMenu is used. This includes all the data that is sent with the event.

To implement this event, you must override the DiscordListener.onUserSelectMenuInteraction(UserSelectMenuInteractionEvent) method in your DiscordListener class and then register it in your main class with DiscordJv.registerListeners(DiscordListener...)

Since:
1.0
Author:
Seailz
